title: BRITAX B-SAFE: Adjusting the Harness Straps
description: Instructions for adjusting the harness straps on the BRITAX B-SAFE to fit your child.

asset.author: Britax Child Safety, Inc
asset.hookText: Instructions for adjusting the harness straps on the BRITAX B-SAFE to fit your child. For more information about the B-SAFE, visit: http://www.britaxusa.com/car-seats/b-safe.

transcripts: Securing your child harness strap adjustment loose in the infant car seat harness by pressing the harness adjuster release button and pulling both harness straps forward. Locate the harness yoke on the back of the infant car seat slide one harness strap off the yoke from the front of the seat pull the harness strap through and out of the cover and shell do not remove the comfort pad or chest clip when changing harness height. Ensure that the harness strap is not twisted and rethread the harness through the appropriate harness slot in the cover and shell from the back of the seat reattach the harness straps to the yoke. Repeat these steps with the second harness strap.
